Package com.g1t11.socialmagnet.controller.socialmagnet

Class SocialMagnetController

java.lang.Object
com.g1t11.socialmagnet.controller.Controller
com.g1t11.socialmagnet.controller.socialmagnet.SocialMagnetController
Direct Known Subclasses:
FriendsController, MainMenuController, NewsFeedController, ThreadController, WallController
public abstract class SocialMagnetController
extends Controller
This abstract class acts as the base controller of all Social Magnet pages.
